author: Indiesoft LLC
description: It's a collection of assets to help you developing 3D games with the Defold game engine. Use included prefabs to quickly prototype structures, levels, and to test game mechanics. Try out ideas quickly!
name: Scene3D

releases.message:
## What's Changed
* The project simplified and upgraded to Defold 1.5.0.
* Added an example game: `blocksbuster` by @notbadgun
* New math functions.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-scene3d/compare/1.1.0...1.2.0

## What's Added
* Blob shadows (implemented as 2D sprites).
* New scene: `shadows` to test blob shadows.
* Simplex Noise 2D, 3D, 4D.
* `scene3d.is_quat`, `scene3d.get_scale_to` functions.
* `script_api` for native functions.
* DefOS dependency + keys for toggling fullscreen (F11, Alt+Enter) + Alt+F4 for exit by @subsoap.

Plus other minor changes.

## New Contributors
* @subsoap made their first contribution in https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-scene3d/pull/3

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-scene3d/compare/1.0.0...1.1.0
